featured.text: The man who has played football knows that teamwork is 39 in modern living.
In teaching young players to cooperate with their fellows on the practice 32 , the game shows them the necessity of teamwork in society.

definition.zh_def: 團隊合作，指多個人共同努力以達成共同目標的過程。
definition.en_def: The collaborative effort of a group of individuals working together to achieve a common goal.
definition.example: Effective teamwork can lead to greater productivity and success.
